message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll find valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm afraid I can't meet you at $1200000. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1800000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider at this time. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
I'm still interested in the product, but I really need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $1500000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not comfortable meeting you at $1500000. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'll meet you at $1700000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
